verses.verse: Paul <WG3972>, a servant <WG1401> of God <WG2316>, and <WG1161> an apostle <WG652> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, according to <WG2596> the faith <WG4102> of <WG1588> God <WG2316>'s elect <WG1588>, and <WG2532> the knowledge <WG1922> of <WG1588> the truth <WG225> which <WG3588> is according to godliness <WG2150>,
in <WG1909> hope <WG1680> of eternal <WG166> life <WG2222>, which <WG3739> God <WG2316>, who cannot lie <WG893>, promised <WG1861> before <WG4253> times <WG5550> eternal <WG166>;

but1161, 5319 in his own <WG2398> seasons <WG2540> manifested <WG5319> his <WG846> word <WG3056> in <WG1722> the message <WG2782>, wherewith <WG3739> I <WG1473> was intrusted <WG4100> according to <WG2596> the commandment <WG2003> of God <WG2316> our <WG2257> Saviour <WG4990>;

to Titus <WG5103>, my true <WG1103> child <WG5043> after <WG2596> a common <WG2839> faith <WG4102>: Grace5485, 1656 and peace <WG1515> from <WG575> God <WG2316> the Father <WG3962> and2532, 2962 Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> our <WG2257> Saviour <WG4990>.

For this <WG5127> cause <WG5484> left I <WG2641> thee <WG4571> in <WG1722> Crete <WG2914>, that <WG2443> thou shouldest set in order <WG1930> the things <WG3588> that were wanting <WG3007>, and <WG2532> appoint <WG2525> elders <WG4245> in every <WG2596> city <WG4172>, as <WG5613> I <WG1473> gave thee <WG4671> charge <WG1299>;

if <WG1487> any <WG5100> man is <WG2076> blameless <WG410>, the husband <WG435> of one <WG1520> wife <WG1135>, having <WG2192> children <WG5043> that believe <WG4103>, who are not <WG3361> accused <WG2724> of riot <WG810> or <WG2228> unruly <WG506>.

For <WG1063> the bishop <WG1985> must <WG1163> be <WG1511> blameless <WG410>, as <WG5613> God <WG2316>'s steward <WG3623>; not <WG3361> self-willed <WG829>, not <WG3361> soon angry <WG3711>, no <WG3361> brawler <WG3943>, no <WG3361> striker <WG4131>, not <WG3361> greedy of filthy lucre <WG146>;
but <WG235> given to hospitality <WG5382>, a lover of good <WG5358>, sober-minded <WG4998>, just <WG1342>, holy <WG3741>, self-controlled <WG1468>;

holding <WG472> to the faithful <WG4103> word <WG3056> which <WG2596> is according to the teaching <WG1322>, that <WG2443> he may be <WG5600> able <WG1415> to <WG2532> exhort <WG3870> in <WG1722> the sound <WG5198> doctrine <WG1319>, and <WG2532> to convict <WG1651> the gainsayers <WG483>.

For <WG1063> there are <WG1526> many <WG4183> unruly <WG506> men <WG2532>, vain talkers <WG3151> and <WG2532> deceivers <WG5423>, specially <WG3122> they <WG3588> of <WG1537> the circumcision <WG4061>,

whose <WG3739> mouths <WG1993> must <WG1163> be stopped <WG1993>; men who <WG3748> overthrow <WG396> whole <WG3650> houses <WG3624>, teaching <WG1321> things which <WG3739> they ought <WG1163> not <WG3361>, for <WG5484> filthy <WG150> lucre <WG2771>'s sake <WG5484>.

One <WG5100> of <WG1537> themselves <WG846>, a prophet <WG4396> of their <WG846> own <WG2398>, said <WG2036>, Cretans <WG2912> are always <WG104> liars <WG5583>, evil <WG2556> beasts <WG2342>, idle <WG692> gluttons <WG1064>.

This <WG3778> testimony <WG3141> is <WG2076> true <WG227>. For which cause <WG1223> reprove <WG1651> them <WG846> sharply <WG664>, that <WG2443> they may be sound <WG5198> in <WG1722> the faith <WG156>,
not <WG3361> giving heed to <WG4337> Jewish <WG2451> fables <WG3454>, and <WG2532> commandments <WG1785> of men <WG444> who turn away from <WG654> the truth <WG225>.

To the pure <WG2513> all things <WG3956> are pure <WG2513>: but <WG1161> to them that are defiled <WG3392> and <WG2532> unbelieving <WG571> nothing <WG3762> is pure <WG2513>; but <WG235> both <WG2532> their <WG846> mind <WG3563> and <WG2532> their <WG846> conscience <WG4893> are defiled <WG3392>.

They profess <WG3670> that they know <WG1492> God <WG2316>; but <WG1161> by their works <WG2041> they deny <WG720> him <WG5607>, being abominable <WG947>, and <WG2532> disobedient <WG545>, and <WG2532> unto <WG4314> every <WG3956> good <WG18> work <WG2041> reprobate <WG96>.
